location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly to Colonel William Earle

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a draft of an address that the Commissioner of Ajmere (Leslie Saunders) has proposed the Thakor of Baghera give and which Pelly has approved, and enclosing a copy of the Commissioner's note to Pelly.Enclosed with the letter is a draft letter to the Thakor of Baghera stating that they are satisfied with the address and requesting that on his return home he will report that Her Majesty's Government expects that they will maintain the peace within their states, keep free of debt and cherish the interests of those committed to their charge.
